title: update.json format undocumented and confusing
description: The _ralph_apply_update_queue function only processes .newStories[] and .updateStories[] arrays. But the /update skill and documentation suggest putting stories in storyOrder/pending arrays directly. This causes updates to be silently ignored.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Document correct update.json format in skills/update/SKILL.md
newStories: array of full story objects to create
updateStories: array of partial story updates (id + fields to change)
Update /update skill workflows to use correct format
Add validation: warn if update.json has storyOrder/pending (ignored)
Test: Create update.json with newStories, verify merge works
